body:
I have had an idea for the reward that people should get if they win a tournament. 

Maybe be they could win a special badge that could only be awarded to winners of tournaments. It can be a new design if anyone wants to come up with one. Just an idea:) maybe this: Ψ, as suggested by SirCyanide
And the color can be gold
Comment your ideas and your feedback.
